import { Button, Navbar } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Container,Row,Col} from "react-bootstrap"; function Menu() { const [selectedTag, setSelectedTag] = useState("All"); // Sample menu items for each tag const menuItems = [ { id: 1, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "All" }, { id: 2, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "All" }, { id: 3, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Breakfast" }, { id: 4, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Breakfast" }, { id: 5, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Lunch" }, { id: 6, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Lunch" }, { id: 7, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Shake" }, { id: 8, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Shake" }, { id: 9, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Dinner" }, { id: 10, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "Dinner" }, ]; // Filter menu items based on the selected tag const filteredMenuItems = selectedTag === "All" ? menuItems : menuItems.filter((item) => item.tag === selectedTag); return ( <>

Our Menu

{filteredMenuItems.map((item, index) => (

{item.name}

${item.price.toFixed(2)}

{item.description}

))} ); } export default Menu;
